import React,{useEffect}from'react';import L,{Marker}from'leaflet';import'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css';import markerIcon from'./marker-icon.png';// Import a custom marker icon if desired import markerData from'./data/date_testing.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Map=function Map(){useEffect(function(){var map=L.map('map').setView([33.529115,-112.264551],13);L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png',{attribution:'Map data © OpenStreetMap contributors',minZoom:0,maxZoom:30}).addTo(map);var customIcon=L.icon({iconUrl:markerIcon,// Custom marker icon URL iconSize:[80,112],// size of the icon iconAnchor:[40,90],// point of the icon which will correspond to marker's location popupAnchor:[-3,-76]});var delay=0;// Delay for animating markers markerData.forEach(function(marker,index){var lat=marker.lat,lon=marker.lon,city=marker.city,date=marker.date;var markerOptions={icon:customIcon};setTimeout(function(){var mapMarker=new Marker([lat,lon],markerOptions).bindPopup("".concat(city,"
Date: ").concat(date)).addTo(map);},delay);delay+=1000;// Increase the delay for each marker by 1 second });return function(){map.remove();};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"map",style:{height:'500px',width:'100%'}});};export default Map;
